website_summaries.verdict: A high-quality tank that includes everything you need to get started. Perfect choice for small snakes, lizards, and frogs.
pros: We loved that the Exo Terra tank was spacious and well-ventilated
The dual front doors make access to the tank simple and secure
Kit comes with all the accessories you need to get started
The foam back and rope vines provide quality climbing options for small, active reptiles
cons: Sits at a higher price point than its competitors

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Crested Gecko kit
customer_reviews.text: If you have one Crested Gecko, look no further, this is the kit you need, quality with all you need to get going. Happy Gecko.
customer_reviews.author: CriticalEye

customer_reviews.title: Quality, good value terranium for my crestie!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect terranium for my juvenile crested gecko! I love all of the useful accessories it came with (plastic plants, foam vine, water dish, substrate, meters, light). I only wish it came with a bulb for the light, or at least a voucher for the bulb. I added a magnetic feeder (Pangea Ultimate Gecko Ledge) and a climbing vine from it's breeding terranium so it had something familiar in it's new habitat. This was packaged with care and it arrived in a timely manner and in one piece. I'm very pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie S.

customer_reviews.title: Love the front doors
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little start up for our crested gecko. We did toss the back décor and flexible stick as they both flake and make a mess. The doors appear easy to pop off if someone were to over open them and were not careful. However, love the tank design and the accessories are already well loved by the gecko.
customer_reviews.author: Meorb

customer_reviews.title: Great tank!
customer_reviews.text: So far this tank is really great. The decor it came with filled it out nicely, added a couple small branches I found outside to add more climbing opportunities for my new crested gecko. I did buy a digital 2 in 1because reviews for the little ones this comes with weren't great, but I put them in to check them and they give off about the same readings as the digital one. But we'll see how long they last, and I would still recommend the digital one. EDIT: I figured out the light. The box sits in the middle nestled between the top latches.
customer_reviews.author: Clawdee

customer_reviews.title: Jungle Feel, Great Habitat Kit for the Money!
customer_reviews.text: My son LOVES this habitat kit! We have had several tree frogs and lizards in here and they all seem to love it. You can see and film your pets easily, and everything they include really makes this look like a top notch habitat for our little pets!
customer_reviews.author: Christian Baker

customer_reviews.title: Ok but has issues
customer_reviews.text: One flaw is crickets can crawl up the back wall and get up on top to hide from frogs etc. They can escape out small holes at the top in the back. I solved this by cutting a thin strip of wood so they cant get on top of the back wall. I dont believe I should have to modify the terrarium so crickets cant hide or escape. And yes both the slides at the top were in the closed position. Other than that I like it.
customer_reviews.author: BB67

customer_reviews.title: Not escape proof
customer_reviews.text: I HAD my baby leopard gecko in here and it escaped within less than 24hrs. I made sure everything was closed. I thought maybe it was hiding well but I took the tank apart and my gecko is long gone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: i use the terrarium to hold 3 grey tree frogs and a salamander and it’s wonderful! it was easy to set up and it’s easy to clean. it provides a great amount of space for my pets, and they can jump across the space without landing on each other. the frogs really enjoy sitting on the decorations that are included.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Cook

customer_reviews.title: Nice Tank
customer_reviews.text: The terrarium is beautiful, it came with all the pieces listed, and came quicker than I expected. The only reason why I’m giving it 2 stars is because it came cracked under the doors and I still haven’t received my refund even though I returned it in February.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Complete Kit!
customer_reviews.text: We had gotten a baby crested gecko from a friend and needed an enclosure. This is a wonderful size to start off with and our lizzy loves it! Keeps moisture well for about 6-8 hours before needing another spritz. It’s a wonderful deal with the light fixture. Overall we are very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Christine DeCrescenzo

customer_reviews.title: Buy from a store
customer_reviews.text: good tank for the price but I would recommend paying a little extra and get it from a store. first one i got had a huge crack and the replacement ones latch is hard to open and close
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: its ok put not impressed with design of tank
customer_reviews.text: Good , product will only use cfl bulbs which makes using a heat bulb impossible. Background has an opening where crickets can get behind at top which means they can escape by holes where screen top attaches and go behind background to get away from frogs and reptiles .
customer_reviews.author: sandra  healey

customer_reviews.title: If you want escaped crickets, this is the item for you
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT get this item, there’s a huge design flaw at the top of the cage for cords but crickets can come out of it. A cricket already came out and I had to clean my room and house because of it.
customer_reviews.author: Yusuke Shiomura

customer_reviews.title: Scam
customer_reviews.text: They advertised a kit and when I received it. It was just the tank.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer Vermillion

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I’m not a fan of is the branch that comes with it. It sheds every time you touch it
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Lots of stuff for a good price
customer_reviews.text: Good price. I'd say it actually comes with too many accessories. I can't find my tree frogs most of the time. Note, you will probably need a different heat source for most tree-frogs and definitely for reptiles.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Clark

customer_reviews.title: Fast delievery, nothing broken, nothing missing. The ...
customer_reviews.text: Fast delievery, nothing broken, nothing missing. The only thing that was a bit off was the brick of substrate it took more then 10min to soak and take apart. Besides that I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra&Steven

customer_reviews.title: ok for quick set up
customer_reviews.text: I like this product for a quick set up, but I received broken every time I ordered (4) . The only problems I see with this is keeping humidity, but there are different methods on going about it. Port holes could be a little bigger, the background is kinda weak. I would suggest taking it out and doing your own. I find that at the size 12x12x18 still makes it seem crowded even for dart frogs. The thermometer, and hydrometer aren't worth using for a base reading. Here's a picture of my old one I picked up back home.
customer_reviews.author: Jamone Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise great deal and great merchandise
customer_reviews.text: Everything was as advertised except for we did not receive the substrate in the kit. Otherwise great deal and great merchandise.
customer_reviews.author: Larousco

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! love the vine! wish there was a bulb with it and a waterfall, but everything was intact & it is a great start!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Neupert

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Exo Terra PT2602 Rainforest Habitat Kit, Small Size and included items, are just perfect for any age young or old
customer_reviews.author: B.Blackwell

customer_reviews.title: Although it's a very nice tank I expected it to have everything we needed ...
customer_reviews.text: Although it's a very nice tank I expected it to have everything we needed and it didn't. Also it only has a place for one bulb and you need at least 2 different kinds of light bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: Richard D.

customer_reviews.title: 2nd chance
customer_reviews.text: Had to reorder this as it was broken when I pulled it out of the box. The item was in a larger box with another item the hot rock i orderd and it might have been then reason it was broken. It was not packed very well and had alot of room to move around inthe larger box. Soon as requested return paperwork another was shipped that next day recieved it fast not broken this time but still packed very poorly
customer_reviews.author: Manchu

customer_reviews.title: Great deal, and great quality
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this kit. My husband was impressed with how nice it looked. It was easy to set up, and I had enough coconut fiber for multiple cage changes. The gap between the back wall and they top is a little annoying because my tiny frog hids up there all day, but at least he is happy. I wish it came with a light bulb, but I understand that the type of light depends on the type of animal you have in there. It has held up well so far, and I love the front opening doors. The doors make it so much easier to clean and feed than doing it from the top.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Terrarium!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome terrarium. It came as described with all the plants, vines, etc. It also shipped very fast (ordered on one day, shipped next, then came the next day). I am very pleased with the product. I actually ordered this terrarium for my colony of giant cave cockroaches, that are native to South America. The rainforest habitat kit is perfect for them.
customer_reviews.author: DYLAN

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: Its awesome my frogs love it. I loved that everything I needed was there didn't have to buy anything else.
customer_reviews.author: jessica nieves

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: I've had this terrarium for about two months.It works really well and my tree frog is doing great living in it.The only down side of the tank is that my crickets could hide at the top of the background,where my frog can't get them.To fix this,I had to put a stripe of foam on top the background. After that the terrarium worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew C Radovan

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, but the one I ordered arrived shattered :(
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline R Roman

customer_reviews.title: arrived on time, no problems, perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new habitat for my reed frogs. This is beautiful My frogs love it and I do too. Easy to clean and I hear the call of the wild at night.
customer_reviews.author: spanky

customer_reviews.title: Don't be fooled
customer_reviews.text: This is not the size they claim. It's much, much smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Mechabro Nine

customer_reviews.title: Good Intents. Bad Packaging
customer_reviews.text: I chose 2 stars because what came in this kit was great and was everything i need all in one cheap price. And the tank was perfect for what i needed. That said it came cracked. I didnt bother returning it because i dont have the time. So I ordered the tank seperatly again without all the items but kept the items from the kit. I was very disapointed. Exo-terra and amazon should do better then send a cracked tank.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the medium size. It is huge and fantastic quality. The plants that come with it take a bit of effort to make it look realistic, but they are a much better quality than most fake plants. Way better than I even expected! I have two juvenile whites tree frogs in it, and they are VERY happy with their new cage! Definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lorelei B Rodgers

product_meta.title: Exo Terra Rainforest Habitat Kit (includes PT2602) - Small
product_meta.description: The Exo Terra Cameroon Rainforest Habitat Kit is the ideal set-up for the beginner herpetoculturist! The kit comes with all of the components necessary to give your terrarium hobby a successful start including the Exo Terra Glass Terrarium, designed by European herpetologists. An instruction manual is included to guide you through the process of installation, decoration and maintenance of the Exo Terra Cameroon Rainforest Terrarium Kit. It is ideal for small species of snakes, frogs, lizards and geckos.
feature_bullets: Quality and performance driven products for your pet
Provide a better quality of living for your pet with Exo Terra

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
